message: I'm getting this error when I boot up celeryd via manage.py
it looks like it gets all ready to go, then explodes for some reason I have not yet determined.
and redis is the latest version (I believe, I can't figure out how to ask redis-server what version is running)
redis-server is running (I can use redis-cli to talk to it)
I'm not a Celery expert, but it looks like the error (unknown command SUBSCRIBE) is coming from Redis itself, which suggest you might be running an old version. Use
oops. use "redis-cli info" to check your version (should be the first item in the list)
looks like i had to uninstall the redis 1.2 package from apt, and re-install 2.2.6 from source
